channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Insane King
channel.description:
**Class:** Insane King
**Crowned From:** Fool
**Goal:** Be executed by the court
**Can be starting king but only about a 10% chance it will be**
**Passive: Beloved Royalty -** After being executed by the court the court will be unable to vote a new king for the next 3 days
**Passive: Dread -** After being executed by the court they will not be able to vote anyone up for 1 day
**Day Ability: Royal Finger -** Your next vote counts as two **(No limit to uses)**
**Day Ability: Unholy Execution -** The player voted for treason is executed **(1 use)**
**Night ability: Threat -** Make a player vote for execution when you are voted up, it will appear to them and the rest of the court that they voted whatever they intended to vote **(4 uses)**
**Night Ability: Lookout -** Send guards that prevent you from getting any negative affects and dying tonight **(4 uses)**

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Insane King
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Okay ty! I like the new ability a lot more as it is useful and not for the lolz

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Insane King
item.dc:creator: Yuzu
item.description:
All of King’s abilities doesn’t count as visiting. And yes, Obs can follow the King.

Imho it would be the best to remove the silent killing ability because it’s useless, it gives nothing for you to get your goal achieved. It’s even worse; it’s going against your objective, because the less players there are, the lower chances you have of getting executed.

To be honest it would be better to remove the “Negative Effect Prevention” from his guards and give him Phys’ Self-Care so he can heal himself off of Butler’s poison if he suspects he’s poisoned by him or when he got poisoned/bled by Assassin/CL.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Insane King

item.description:
That’s what i was thinking

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Insane King
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Foxx:

Passive: Beloved Royalty - After being executed by the court the court will be unable to vote a new king for the next 3 days

This would be terrible and cause lots of chaos

Foxx:

Passive: Dread - After being executed by the court they will not be able to vote anyone up for 1 day

Don’t mind this one

Foxx:

Night Ability: Psychopathic Tendencies - Secretly execute a player (3 uses)

This is unneeded

Foxx:

Night Ability: Lookout - Send guards that prevent you from getting any negative affects and dying tonight (4 uses)

I have no problem with this one

Read full topic

Crowned From: Fool

Goal: Be executed by the court

Can be starting king but only about a 10% chance it will be

Passive: Beloved Royalty - After being executed by the court the court will be unable to vote a new king for the next 3 days

Passive: Dread - After being executed by the court they will not be able to vote anyone up for 1 day

Day Ability: Royal Finger - Your next vote counts as two (No limit to uses)

Day Ability: Unholy Execution - The player voted for treason is executed (1 use)

Night ability: Threat - Make a player vote for execution when you are voted up, it will appear to them and the rest of the court that they voted whatever they intended to vote (4 uses)

Night Ability: Lookout - Send guards that prevent you from getting any negative affects and dying tonight (4 uses)
